TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Rappresenta una raccolta ordinata di oggetti .

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tutti gli oggetti che derivano da hanno un' denominata .All objects that derive from have an named . Tutti gli oggetti che derivano da hanno un' denominata .All objects that derive from have an named . Tuttavia, se queste raccolte vengono impostate nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], quindi gli elementi nella raccolta devono essere classi derivate di piuttosto diretto oggetti.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Infatti, non supporta un costruttore pubblico predefinito.This is because does not support a default public constructor. Di conseguenza, gli elementi in un che è stata impostata [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] corrisponderà in genere un' derivata che supportano un costruttore pubblico predefinito, ad esempio o .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples L'esempio seguente crea una e lo associa a un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Il viene aggiunto al su un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

summary.span: Aggiunge l'entità specificata a questo oggetto .

span.span: Adds the specified to this .
Always returns 0.

returns.span: Questo si differenzia dall'implementazione standard di per , che deve restituire l'indice in corrispondenza del nuovo elemento aggiunto all'insieme.

span.span: This deviates from the standard implementation for , which should return the index where the new item was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples L'esempio seguente crea una e lo associa a un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Il viene aggiunto al su un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] l'esempio non utilizza letteralmente , ma viene chiamato in modo implicito dal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] supporto per le raccolte dell'elaborazione.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Per informazioni dettagliate sulle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] e le raccolte, vedere [Cenni preliminari su XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
